summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Organization Hierarchy System (Milestone 2) for Operational Management Platform. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate (20/20 tests passed). Frontend UI testing achieved 100% success rate with all organization management features working perfectly. The 5-level hierarchical structure (Company → Region → Location → Department → Team) is fully functional with proper level validation, user assignments, and invitation system.
passed_tests: Login with test user having organization association
Get organization units endpoint (/api/organizations/units)
Get organization hierarchy endpoint (/api/organizations/hierarchy)
Create root organization unit (Company level)
Level validation - root units must be level 1
Level validation - children must be parent level + 1
Create complete 5-level hierarchy (Company → Region → Location → Department → Team)
Update organization unit name and description
Get users assigned to organization unit
Create user invitation with email and role
Get pending invitations
Delete protection - cannot delete unit with active children
Soft delete organization units (bottom-up deletion)
Dashboard navigation to organization page
Organization page renders with proper title and description
Hierarchy tree displays with correct indentation and structure
Level badges display with correct colors (Company=blue, Region=green, etc.)
User count badges show correct values
Create unit dialog opens and functions properly
Unit creation form validation and submission
Real-time hierarchy updates after unit creation
Edit unit dialog functionality
View users dialog with proper empty state message
Invite user dialog with email and role selection
Expand/collapse tree node functionality
Child unit creation with proper level validation in UI
Parent-child relationship display in hierarchy tree
Delete confirmation dialog functionality
Action buttons (add child, view users, edit, delete) all functional
Responsive design elements properly positioned
5-level organizational structure description displayed
Authentication flow integration with organization features
Session persistence across organization operations
